tool_description:
A flexible RESTful prayer times API that returns JSON times for a given day or a calendar for a whole month.

For more detailed documentation, various methods and additional endpoints, please see the complete documentation on http://aladhan.com/prayer-times-api.
title: Prayer Times

api_list.name: Calendar by Address
api_list.description: Get a prayer times calendar for a month by address

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Any of the prayer time calculation methods specified on https://aladhan.com/calculation-methods

parameters.name: school
parameters.description: 1 for Hanfi. 0 for all others, including, Shafi, Hanbali, etc.

parameters.name: latitudeAdjustmentMethod
parameters.description: Method for adjusting times higher latitudes - for instance, if you are checking timings in the UK or Sweden. 1 - Middle of the Night 2 - One Seventh 3 - Angle Based

utterances.utterance: What are the prayer times for March 2023 in New York City?
Can you provide the prayer calendar for July 2024 in London using the Hanfi school method?
Get the prayer times for November 2023 in Paris with the Middle of the Night latitude adjustment method.
Show me the prayer calendar for January 2025 in Dubai using the Shafi school.
What are the prayer times for September 2023 in Toronto with the Angle Based latitude adjustment?
Provide the prayer calendar for May 2024 in Sydney using the One Seventh latitude adjustment method.
Get the prayer times for December 2023 in Berlin with the Hanfi school method.
What are the prayer times for April 2024 in Istanbul using the Shafi school?
Show me the prayer calendar for August 2023 in Mumbai with the Middle of the Night latitude adjustment.
Can you provide the prayer times for February 2025 in Tokyo using the Angle Based latitude adjustment method?
